text: [Fuhuo ri] tamen dou jiang chuxianzai an la mianqian.[Na shi] ruozhe jiang dui jiao'ao zi da zhe [shouling] shuo:“Women yuan shi zhuisui nimen de,[xianzai] nimen neng bangzhu women jianqing yidian er an la de xingfa ma?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Jiaru an la yindao women, women jiu yindao nimen. Wulun women fanu haishi renshou [xingfa], dui women dou shi yiyang de,[xian zai] women wu chu ke tao.”
